data.name: Loose Life
data.detailed_description:
Description

In an instant, the world had changed. The same houses, the same streets, the same sun in the sky. But they will never be the same again. With the first explosions, millions of people's lives changed, and you are among them.




You woke up as if in a nightmare. Everything you've just built is ruined. Now you need to get out of here fast, and get your family out of here. If you can.

Write your story

  • Make decisions, each of which, obvious and not so obvious, affects the story and your opportunities
  • Find ways out of unique situations
  • Get food, don't forget sleep, and many other indicators
  • Explore locations full of secrets
  • Study people's stories and fates as well as your own
  • Inspired by terrible events
And you'll get the ending you've created

Seasons

  • Dearest Price
  • ???
  • ???
  • ???

data.short_description: Find yourself in the middle of the humanitarian horror of war. You have no weapons, and you are not a soldier. You only have a life and the way you want to survive. Write your story. Maybe you will lose life. Maybe you'll live loose. It all depends on your decisions, which always have consequences.
